text: Deliciosa birria de chivo. Tambien tienen machitos por si te gusta. El menudo rojo o blanco estilo Colima.... tortillas hechas a mano y grandes.... amable servicio..muy bueno se los recomiendo..
Great Mexican food!!! Wonderful environment and the staff was amazing!!! You have to try this place!!!
Delicioso lugar con muchas variedades. También sirven micheladas y están muy ricas. Muy rico todo
The food is amazing! Great service definitely worth trying! I've tried a few things already and all of it is amazing. Everyone is so nice. So if you want to eat authentic Mexican food try this place.
Really great food! Good customer service! If you are  looking for some good authentic Mexican food this will be a great choice. My favorite is the birria and the tortillas a mano.

Amazing amazing amazing!!! I dont know what else to say But amazing!!
Best Mexican food I have had here in Vegas. It is my new go to for good food!
